title: Play Food & Wine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Beer/Wine, French, Spanish, Tapas, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fine dining French/Spanish tapas and wine bar featuring constantly changing small plates and large selection of wines by the glass. Separate vegan menu available upon request. The vegan menu changes often, but can include carrot ginger soup in a coconut milk broth; cucumber salad with seasonal greens and a black rice puree; red lentil fritters with a spicy eggplant chutney; asparagus with a parsnip puree or the chef's vegan creation of the day. Recommended wine pairings are offered for each dish.
